import React from "react"; import PoolBar from "../components/cards/bars/PoolBar.js" import { Button, Container } from "shards-react"; import Layout from '../components/layout/Layout.js'; export default class DnaHomeSection extends React.Component { render() { return (

DNA Protocol

Users pool their resources to mitigate risk and to optain high value NFTs.

Acquire

Through a series of automated smart contract interactions, the pooled funds are used to purchase an NFT and put that NFT up for sale at the agreed upon price.

Sell

Once the NFT is sold through another series of smart contract interaction the proceeds are distributed to the owners.

Mitigation

If the NFT does not sell for the purposed price after one year, the price will be lowered to the original purchase price for an additional year.

Award

If the NFT has not sold after two years. The NFT will be awarded to one of the owners through a random number generation that has been weighted proportionally to the owner’s contribution.

); } }
